lead_paragraph: A thoughtful meeting in the Bay Area with the San Francisco brass and Mark Melancon didn't need much convincing. Not to mention he is already looking forward to talking nutrition and sport science with Hunter Pence, his former Houston teammate and yoga pal.

headline.print_headline: Mark Melancon Knew Giants Were the Perfect Fit Right Away
headline.main: Mark Melancon Knew Giants Were the Perfect Fit Right Away
